Description: Gibson Longhorn Les Paul Limited Edition Guitar of the Month 2008 Midnight BlueThe Gibson Longhorn Double Cut Guitar has a unique body style that incorporates slightly extended, asymmetrical cutaways on a solid piece of mahogany with an AA figured maple top. The special-design L.R. Baggs piezo pickup beneath the Tune-O-Matic bridge combined with two EMG-85 active humbuckers housed in the bridge and neck offer an extended range of tonal options. Separate pickup outputs enable guitarists to use the pickups individually or blend their sounds. The Longhorn has a 1960s-era slim tapered mahogany neck, traditional headstock, and flowerpot inlays on the headstock that date back to Gibson’s guitars, mandolins, and archtops of the early 1900s.This guitar is in Near Mint condition and is an awesome limited edition Guitar of the Month from 2008. Super tough to find and VERY LOW Serial number 069. Gorgeous Huge Flame Maple top on this one also!
Title: 2008 Gibson Limited Edition Longhorn Guitar of the Week
